Package com.algolia.instantsearch.utils

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ItemClickSupport.OnItemClickListener
    Invokes a callback when an item has been clicked.
    ItemClickSupport.OnItemLongClickListener
    Invokes a callback when an item has been clicked and held.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ItemClickSupport
    Sets onItem[Long]Click listeners on a RecyclerView.
    JSONUtils
    Provides helper function for manipulating JSONObjects.
    LayoutViews
    Iterates on views in a layout.
    SearchViewFacade
    A facade to handle both android.widget.SearchView and SearchView transparently.
